name: Sex Drive (TOJam Edition)
description:
Developed By
John Axon, Marion Esquian, Stephane Goulet, Julian Spillane

You are a fruit. You have a car. Your cur runs on passion. What passion? A passion for sex.

Luckily for you, you've got some sweet produce partners to keep you "in the mood".

Keep your Juice up by answering sexy texts ("sexts") and staring at sexy snaps while avoiding pedestrians and obstacles.

How long can you last? ;)

Controls (Computer Builds)

Driving:
Left & Right - change lanes
Up - raise phone

Cell Phone:
Left & Right - cycle responses
Down - lower phone
Z - send response

Escape - quit

Controls (Phone)

Driving:
Swipe Left & Right - change lanes
Swipe Up - raise phone

Cell Phone:
Swipe Left & Right - cycle responses
Swipe Down - lower phone
Tap - send response

Sext Contributors

John Axon, Stephane Goulet, Julian Spillane, Mathieu Renard, Coluche, Smashed Hat, Marc Lavoine, Chris Baragar, "david", mack, Nicolas Barrière-Kucharski, Brian "The Yellow Dart" Winward, Terry B, mb, Thankfully A. Nonymous, The Monster King, Matt Daemon
